channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for NY
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for NY

item.title: Report X-2024031428
item.description:
Report X-2024031428

Identified by scraper @ 2024-04-01T03:13:04+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-23
  • City: BUFFALO
  • State: NY
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: RESPONDER RECEIVED MESSAGE THAT THERE WAS A LEAKER ON RED BELT. WENT TO RED BELT AND GOT THE PACKAGE. RESPONDER PUT ZEP ZORBENT DOWN AND TOOK PACKAGE AWAY IN GRAY BIN FOR PROCESSING.

item.title: Report X-2024031414
item.description:
Report X-2024031414

Identified by scraper @ 2024-04-01T03:13:04+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-22
  • City: BROOKLYN
  • State: NY
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: DESIGNATED RESPONDER WAS CALLED TO RESPOND TO A SPILL IN THE PRIMARY. DESIGNATED RESPONDER WEARING FULL PPE FOUND PACKAGE ON A SLIDE IN THE PRIMARY. PACKAGE WAS BROUGHT TO DMP PROCESSING AREA FOR INSPECTION AND PROCESSING.
